# providerImage

**Instance Property**

An image representing your app.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var providerImage: INImage { get set }
```

## Discussion

The system displays the image from this property in any interfaces involved in making reservations. For example, the Maps app displays this image as part of the reservations workflow.

## Specifying the Default Values

- **defaultBookingDate**: The default booking date to use when placing the initial reservations request.
- **defaultPartySize**: The party size to use when placing the initial reservations request.
- **maximumPartySize**: The maximum party size allowed by the restaurant.
- **minimumPartySize**: The minimum party size allowed by the restaurant.
